Whoami

Whoami?

Hello friend. I am from Iceland and my name is Peter although online I am known as AlphaBurn. I'm a student who's been fascinated by the cybersecurity world and although I may not be the best I am constantly trying to improve and level up my skillset. I have recently started a CTF team called VIKiN9Z and we love to participate in the newest ctfs! If you're a person who's interested in joining don't hesitate to contact me on Discord Ragnarok#6338. That's all hope you have a good day <3!

VIKiN9Z

Here are some stats about our team. We have 2 members me and LeKSuS. Our teams overall rating place in 2021 on Ctftime was 872 with 13.242 pts after participating in 5 ctfs.
